I loved smell, the lather, the way my skin felt after using it. It did brighten my facial dark spots a bit, not so much my body skin. My skin felt more "loved" overall after uses. After using it 1x/day x 3 or 4 days, I noticed my facial skin became kind of rashy and sensitive to touch/sun. Looking on the ingredient list, this soap contains FD&C Yellow, a.k.a tartrazine, which often causes skin irritation and allergic reaction. It has also been found to hinder embryo development and disrupt hormonal harmony in men & women. It does lighten the dark spots, but with a cost. The soap is good, and other may not have the same experience I did, but I would just be cautious of the ingredients/chemicals you are putting on your porous skin and when you notice a negative change, stop using and look for something different. I hope this works for others!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024

title: Makes skin feel good
content: I have only been using this soap for 2 weeks.  I use it on my face, arms and hands where I have 'age' spots.  I noticed the difference right away.  It makes your skin so soft and yet not dry at all.  My skin has lightened quite a bit and others have noticed yet not sure what I did.  I highly recommend this product.
